tool_description: Get picture, name, sequence, year, duration, pg, point information of 250 favorite movies on IMDB.
name: IMDB Top 250
title: IMDB Top 250

api_list.name: Get Movies with Data
api_list.description:
Get 250 Movies with;

- Rank
- Image
- Name
- Year
- Time
- Pg
- Point
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://imdb-top-250.p.rapidapi.com/api/imdb-top-250"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imdb-top-250.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://imdb-top-250.p.rapidapi.com/api/imdb-top-250"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imdb-top-250.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
